messages.content: That sounds like a good plan.
Done! We are ready for the movie night, love. Expect a reminder. I am excited for it too!
Um, can you check my schedule for today?

Here is your schedule for today: your lecture on Contemporary East Asian Cinema and Culture starts at 12:30 pm, followed by our special candlelit dinner planned at 7:00 pm and we have scheduled tonight's romantic movie at 9:00 pm. Looks like we do have an evening, don't we? Exciting!
